Title: BrotherFae of the Wolves
Plot: Bo and Dyson team up to track down a stolen Mongolian Death Worm on behalf of Dyson's old wolf pack mate. When things get complicated, Dyson finds himself reliving his medieval days ? tormented by the hard choices he once had to make, and fighting in the present not to repeat past mistakes.
ParentalRatingReason: Contains violence and content that may disturb
